course_description: Perfect for busy professionals who want to sharpen their coding skills on weekends. Each weekend focuses on a specific algorithmic pattern with practical, real-world applications.
target_audience: Working developers looking to level up

unit_1.title: Array Mastery Saturday & Sunday
unit_1.description: Master array manipulation techniques that every developer should know
unit_1.saturday_focus: Basic array operations and linear search techniques
unit_1.sunday_focus: Advanced array algorithms and optimization strategies

unit_2.title: Hash Table Power Weekend
unit_2.description: Unlock the full potential of hash-based data structures
unit_2.saturday_focus: Hash table fundamentals and collision handling
unit_2.sunday_focus: Complex hashing strategies and performance optimization

unit_3.title: String Algorithm Safari
unit_3.description: Explore the wild world of string processing and manipulation
unit_3.sunday_focus: Advanced text processing and natural language tasks

unit_4.title: Mathematical Problem Solving
unit_4.description: Apply algorithmic thinking to mathematical challenges

unit_5.title: Integration Challenge Weekend
unit_5.description: Combine multiple algorithmic concepts for complex solutions

unit_6.title: Performance Optimization Workshop
unit_6.description: Focus on making your algorithms faster and more efficient
unit_6.saturday_focus: Time complexity analysis and bottleneck identification

unit_7.title: Interview Simulation Weekend
unit_7.description: Practice real interview scenarios with time pressure
unit_7.saturday_focus: Mock interviews with easy to medium problems
unit_7.sunday_focus: Advanced interview techniques and edge case handling

unit_8.title: Capstone Challenge Weekend
unit_8.description: Final challenge combining all learned techniques
unit_8.sunday_focus: Code review, presentation, and next steps planning
unit_8.final_project: Build a complete algorithm visualization tool

bonus_features.weekday_prep: Optional 15-minute daily challenges to prepare for weekend sessions
bonus_features.community: Access to weekend warrior Discord community
bonus_features.code_reviews: Peer code review sessions every other Sunday
